45478.name: Flying Skill: Steel Dragon
45478.toolTip:
Use this manual to learn how to summon a Mighty Armored Dragon with a flying speed of 290 and a movement speed of 290. Additionally you learn the passive skill Ruler of Dragons. It restores 1% of your max MP and HP every second.

This item cannot be exchanged.

You can only benefit from the skills of one mighty flying mount at any one time. Only the effects of the last mount you summon apply.

45479.name: Flying Skill: Red Dragon
45479.toolTip:

You can only benefit from the skills of one mighty flying mount at any one time. Only the effects of the last mount you summon apply.

Use this manual to learn how to summon an Ancient Mighty Dusk Drake with a flying speed of 290 and a movement speed of 290. It restores 2% of your max MP and HP every second. Additionally you learn the passive skill Destiny's Howl as well as the skill Ancient Corrupting Tide.

You can only benefit from the skills of one ancient mighty flying mount at any one time. Only the effects of the last mount you summon apply.
You activate the skill by getting on your flying mount and pressing the left mouse button (default).

232018.name: 스킬교본: 메카닉 A
232018.toolTip:
[[서비스 이관 특별 선물]]

비행 가능 지역에서 날 수 있는 해방된 페가수스를 소환합니다.
페가수스의 비행 속도는 270이며, 지상에서의 이동속도는 280입니다.
